Package backend.tradesystem.managers

Class TraderManager

java.lang.Object
backend.tradesystem.Manager
backend.tradesystem.trader_managers.TraderManager
public class TraderManager
extends Manager
Used for the actions of a Trader

  • Constructor Details

    • TraderManager

      public TraderManager() throws java.io.IOException
      Initialize the objects to get items from databases
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if something goes wrong with getting database

    • TraderManager

      public TraderManager​(java.lang.String userFilePath, java.lang.String tradableItemFilePath, java.lang.String tradeFilePath) throws java.io.IOException
      Making the database objects with set file paths
      Parameters:
      userFilePath - the user database file path
      tradableItemFilePath - the tradable item database file path
      tradeFilePath - the trade database file path
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - issues with getting the file path

  • Method Details

    • addRequestItem

      public Trader addRequestItem​(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String desc) throws UserNotFoundException, AuthorizationException
      Makes this user request an item
      Parameters:
      id - trader id
      name - name of the item
      desc - description of the item
      Returns:
      the item that was requested
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the user was not found
      AuthorizationException - not allowed to request an item

    • addToWishList

      public Trader addToWishList​(java.lang.String traderId, java.lang.String itemId) throws UserNotFoundException, AuthorizationException, TradableItemNotFoundException
      Adds an item to this trader's wishlist
      Parameters:
      traderId - the trader id
      itemId - the tradable item id to be added
      Returns:
      the updated trader
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the trader with the given userId is not found
      AuthorizationException - not allowed to add to the wishlist
      TradableItemNotFoundException - the item wasn't found

    • removeFromWishList

      public Trader removeFromWishList​(java.lang.String traderId, java.lang.String itemId) throws UserNotFoundException, AuthorizationException
      Remove item from trader's wishlist
      Parameters:
      traderId - the trader
      itemId - the item being removed
      Returns:
      the updated trader
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the trader isn't found
      AuthorizationException - frozen account or if the user can't do this action

    • removeFromInventory

      public Trader removeFromInventory​(java.lang.String traderId, java.lang.String itemId) throws UserNotFoundException, AuthorizationException
      Remove an item from the trader's inventory
      Parameters:
      traderId - the trader
      itemId - the item being removed
      Returns:
      the updated trader
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the trader isn't found
      AuthorizationException - frozen account or if the user can't do this action

    • setIdle

      public Trader setIdle​(java.lang.String traderId, boolean status) throws UserNotFoundException, AuthorizationException
      Set idle status, an idle trader has some limitations such as being unable to trade
      Parameters:
      traderId - the trader
      status - whether the trader is idle
      Returns:
      the updated trader
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the trader isn't found
      AuthorizationException - if unable to go idle

    • setCity

      public Trader setCity​(java.lang.String traderId, java.lang.String city) throws UserNotFoundException, AuthorizationException
      Sets the city of the trader
      Parameters:
      traderId - the trader
      city - the city
      Returns:
      the updated trader
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the trader doesn't exist
      AuthorizationException - if the user isn't a trader

    • addReview

      public Review addReview​(java.lang.String fromUser, java.lang.String toUser, double rating, java.lang.String message) throws UserNotFoundException, AuthorizationException
      Adds a new review
      Parameters:
      fromUser - the user who sent the review
      toUser - the user who received the review
      rating - rating must be between 0 to 10, if greater or less than those bounds then it will assume those bounds
      message - the message of the review
      Returns:
      the new review
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the user ids don't exist
      AuthorizationException - if the users aren't traders

    • removeReview

      public void removeReview​(java.lang.String userThatHasReview, java.lang.String reviewId) throws UserNotFoundException, AuthorizationException
      Remove a review
      Parameters:
      userThatHasReview - the user that needs to have a review removed
      reviewId - the review being removed
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the user isn't found
      AuthorizationException - if the user isn't a trader
